quotes.quote: You're slowly realising you weren't meant to save the world, rather to watch it burn.
That's the thing, little one, the heroes have to win every time. The villain, however, only has to win once.
The only difference between a hero and a villain is the perspective.
You either die a hero, or live long enough to see yourself become  the villain.
A hero without a villain is pointless. A villain without a hero is successful.
When we were children, we idolise the heroes. But as we get older, we understand the villain.
I've broken so many bones. None of them have evr been my own.
You break the rules and become a hero. I break the rule and become the villain. It doesn't seem fair, does it?

I chose my path, you chose the way of a hero. And they found you amusing for a while, the people of this city. But the one thing they love more than hero... is to see a hero fail, fall, die trying. In spite of everything you've done for them, eventually, they will hate you.
quotes.author: Green Goblin

quotes.quote: Every villain is a hero in his own mind.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: A villain is just a victim whose story hasn't been told.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: I am too insane to explain, and you are too normal to understand.
Cry as much as you want but make sure you never cry for the same reason again.
Order your existence in a way which is necessary to meet your needs.
quotes.author: Jim Moriarty

quotes.quote: In every conquest find a way to be victorious.
quotes.author: Jim Moriarty

quotes.quote: I'm not a psychopath, I'm a high-functioning sociopath.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: War doesn't decide who is right, it decides who is left.
quotes.author: Anime Teria

quotes.quote: It's not the fall that kills you. It's not the fall, it's never the fall it's the landing.
quotes.author: Jim Moriarty

quotes.quote: If loving you is a sin, I'll gladly embrace the torments of hell.
quotes.author: Musyoki Alex

quotes.quote: If loving you is a sin, then let hell be my paradise.
quotes.author: Lily Fields

quotes.quote: There are time when the mind is dealt such a blow it hides itself in insanity. There are times when reality is nothing but pain, and to escape that pain the mind must live reality behind.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: I'mma show you, how great I am.
When you see a man fall, don't laugh, learn.
You are who you pretend to be, so be careful who you pretend to be.
From the moment we are born, we begin to die.
A man's past is his business.
The World can always go to hell.
quotes.author: Unknown
